import { useEffect } from "react" import { useState } from "react" import axios from "axios" import { Link} from "react-router-dom" import App from "./App" function Home() { const [data, setData] = useState([]) const[value, setValue] = useState("")// search purpose const [sort, setSort] = useState("")// sorting purpose const[count,setCount]=useState(0) // cart number count useEffect(() => { fetch("http://localhost:3008/Products") .then((res) => { return res.json() }) .then((resp) => { setData(resp) }) }, []) const search=async(e)=>{ e.preventDefault() return await axios.get(`http://localhost:3008/Products?q=${value}`) .then((res)=>{ setData(res.data) }) .catch((err)=>{ console.log("err") }) } let options =["title","price"] const sorting=async(e)=>{ let abc=e.target.value setSort(abc) return await axios.get(`http://localhost:3008/Products?_sort=${abc}&_order=asc`) .then((res)=>{ setData(res.data) }) .catch((err)=>{ console.log(err) }) } const Addcart=(id)=>{ fetch("http://localhost:3008/Products/"+ id) .then((res)=>{ return res.json() }) .then((resp)=>{ console.log(resp) fetch("http://localhost:3008/AddedCart", { method:"POST", headers:{"Content-type":"application/json"}, body:JSON.stringify(resp) }) .then(()=>{ alert("Items added into cart") }) }) } useEffect(()=>{ fetch("http://localhost:3008/AddedCart/") .then((res)=>{ return res.json() }) .then((resp)=>{ setCount(resp) }) }) return (
    setValue(e.target.value)} placeholder="Search your product" />
{count.length}
User











Product Display

{data.map((e) => (
Title:{e.title}
Amount:${e.price}
Quantity:{e.Quantity}
))}
{/*
*/}
) } export default Home;
